whether affidavits and witness statements filed and served in previous federal court proceedings are privileged
the documents lack confidentiality as defined in s 117 of the evidence act 1995 and as required by s 119 of the act
further, the documents were not prepared for the dominant purpose of the client being provided with professional legal services as required by s 119 of the act
hence the documents are not privileged
